title: How to get pixel 4a(5g) charger repleaced ? Phone was bought in Canada and now being used in India.
content: I got my pixel phone from Canada and I'm using it in India. But the charger isn't working. The adaptor seems to be at fault as the cable is working fine , I tried with other pixel phone adapter. The phone was bought in Feb, 2021. Now I wish to get my pixel charger replaced. How should I proceed ?
